channel.title: Adding lunar spells to client
channel.description:
Hey i want to add lunar spells a client base i got because every time i change to lunar it freezes .. i had a client before where lunar spells worked. and it worked fine
But now i got a new client base i want to add lunar spells to it..because it crashes Note: i dont want to change base because ive done quite abit on this base client.
Can somone tell me how to get lunars lunar magic book to work? also can you tell me how to add the prayers piety and chivarly?
Thanks

item.title: Adding lunar spells to client
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

kalvin add my msn…ile add for you…along with prayer interface as i presume ur using delta base

check pm for email

You said “are people too fucking stupid”… Maybe he’s just new to coding. This may be his way of learning too :). Thats how I did… I’d see it and remember it for future uses

Get the Ddsspeced Client.
[/quote] Why?
Are people too fucking stupid these days to make their own?
[/quote]He asked… and it is pretty difficult to add it all. Don’t get mad over nothing too.[/quote] Who said I was mad?
